_header: More speech Madame is of your goodliness
_description: A roundel by Charles d’Orléans — 14 lines

BLHar682.First Lines:
More speche madame is of your goodlynesThen of Aleyne or yet
                    penolope…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…ffor all þe world hit preysith yowre bewteNot that alone
                    but eek yowre Iantilesse
BLHar682.Note: As written, repeats first words of lines 1-2 at end to indicate going back to first four lines of the roundel.
